casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Toney CAUDLE. No. 433P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Robert C. Montgomery, Jane Ammons Gilchrist, Assistant Attorney Generals, William Graham, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of August 2006 by Defendant to Vacate Temporary Stay: "Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of December 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
